page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
Do both parents work? How far do they travel and how much time do they spend travelling to work? These were the questions that we set out to answer:
We found out in our survey, that the majority of people worked in Towcester and the surrounding villages, with many people working in Northampton, Milton Keynes and London. Those working in Towcester tend to be the wives, while the husbands travel. Out of{167}questionnaires that were sent out,{99}replied that both parents worked. { TIME TAKEN TRAVELLING - IN MINUTES. 5-10 11-20 21-40 OVER 40 { {PEOPLE }101 60 57 55
